table_description: The table provides a summary of cash flows from operating, investing, and financing activities for the years 2022 and 2021. It includes details on cash generated from operations, interest and tax payments, purchases and sales of assets, and changes in loans and equity. The table also shows the net cash flow from each activity and the change in cash and cash equivalents over the two years.

| Interest paid |  | (753) |  |
| Tax paid |  | (196,127) | (14,978) |
| Net cash from operating activities |  | 2,021,899 | 706,587 |
| Cash flows from investing activities |  |  |  |
| Purchase of tangible fixed assets |  | (158,457) | (49,225) |
| Sale of fixed asset investments |  | 150 | 1 |
| Interest received |  | 120 |  |

| Cash flows from financing activities |  |  |  |
| New loans in year |  | 250,000 | 1 |
| Share buyback |  | (917,248) |  |
